title: [LFP] B3 JG/TOP SUPP main looking for climbing buddys
body:
Hi guys. :3 I'm looking for some friends to play ranked with... I find it frustrating trying to play ranked by myself. (I tilt quiet alot specially if I'm forced to play ADC or Mid, i feel like i let the team down)

I use TS, skype or Discord (I could probably download curse if needed)

Feel free to add me. :3  IGN: Devi

replies.body: i can adc or top add me in game

Commenting for reference (At work at the moment)

Always keen to try some ranked - I am Bronze 4. Willing to Support/Mid anytime.

Very grounded player - I rarely tilt; Always positive.
